title: Gannett/USA TODAY Headquarters - Hines
snippet: In April 1997, Hines was retained by Gannett Co., Inc. to serve as development manager for its new headquarters facility located on 25 acres in the Tysons Corner area of Fairfax County, Virginia.

title: USA Today Co. - Wikipedia
snippet: USA Today Co., Inc., known until 2025 as Gannett Co., Inc. (/ɡəˈnɛt/ gə-NET), is an American mass media holding company headquartered in New York City. It is the largest U.S. newspaper publisher as measured by total daily circulation. Gannett owns the national newspaper USA Today, as well ...

title: Gannett Headquarters - Office Location & Address
